description.@en: The Pledged Guard is duty-bound to protect and to serve their master. Should they be made a target of assassination, an eel pie or even bird droppings, the Pledged Guard will throw themselves into harmâ€™s way to protect their charge.

effect.@en: When Engaged with an ally and they fail to Counterspell, Dodge, Parry, Resist or cannot do so, you may immediately spend 0 AP and make a Coordination Test. If successful, they are pushed 1 yard away and suffer no effects. You instead suffer in their stead, but cannot Counterspell, Dodge, Parry or Resist its effects.
